file_content.text: Those things keep coming, but at least we're safe in here.
That'll buy us some time, but those droids will find another way in. We need an escape route.
Good work, Theron.
Safe until we run out of food, water... air. We need a way out.
Now what?
I can't destroy Vaylin and SCORPIO if we stay here. Find me an exit.
I have people to kill.
Oh, Commander?
Think I found one.
I know Father's presence when he's near. I felt Mother die, and Arcann's agony. But you? I feel nothing.
I know Father's presence when he's near. I sense Mother and Arcann. But you? I feel nothing.
Our family's bonds are strong.
I remember when Father sent you to bring me home. You hated my cage almost as much as I did.
Do you remember why you were there?
It was cold and dark. Each moment felt like drowning.
You survived because you're powerful. You might be the strongest on this entire world.
Oh, I am. Clever, too. The thing is, Thexan... you didn't bring me home. That was Arcann.
I was trying to get ARIES back online when the door opened.
How utterly convenient. This is clearly a trick.
We've got no clue what's in there. Might be Killer Droid Central.
If it's an escape route, there's only one way to be sure.
Regardless, I'm going in.
Just because a door opens doesn't mean we have to walk through it.
I don't like this at all.
I hate to believe it, much less say it, but this could be SCORPIO trying to help us.
If this is a trap, whoever set it made a fatal error.
The enemy will die, not me.
Vette, you're with me. The rest of you, hold this position.
